sentences.en: His opponents viewed him as stubborn, dogmatic, and inflexible.
sentences.cn: 他的对手认为他固执、教条而且死板。

sentences.en: There is a danger of becoming too dogmatic about teaching methods.
sentences.cn: 在教学方法上存在着过分教条主义的危险。

sentences.en: Many writers at this time held rigidly dogmatic views.
sentences.cn: 许多作家这一时期刻板地固守教条主义的观点。
